projectDescription: Polkadot is an open-source, multichain network protocol that facilitates the secure communication and interoperability of various blockchains. It offers a scalable, sharded architecture that enables the creation of purpose-built chains and provides the necessary tooling for building decentralized applications (dApps) and smart contracts.
